  • Constructor Details

    • ServerThread

      public ServerThread(int port, ServerView view, GameController gameController)

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Opens ServerSocket, waits for both players to connect, prepares and starts a checkers game. Listens to players' input streams for move requests, verifies if they are legal, performs moves on board and sends update messages to both of them.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • sendGameStartMessages

      private void sendGameStartMessages(String gameVariant, int boardSize, String boardString)
      Sends game starting message to both players.
      Parameters:
      gameVariant - Checkers variant
      boardSize - Number of fields horizontally and vertically on Board
      boardString - Initial state of Board

    • handleMoveRequest

      private void handleMoveRequest(String message)
      Handles player's move request. Parses message into starting and landing fields' coordinates, verifies whether move is legal, performs move on board and sends update messages to both players.
      Parameters:
      message - move request in format move;x1;y1;x2;y2

    • sendWinnerMessage

      private void sendWinnerMessage()
      Determines the winner and sends appropriate message to both players.

    • getSocketPrintableFormat

      private String getSocketPrintableFormat(Board board)
      Converts Board object into String message to send to Client.
      Parameters:
      board - Checkers board object to convert
      Returns:
      String representation of current board state. Each character represents one field: w - white pawn b - black pawn W - white queen B - black queen 0 - empty field

    • getUpdateMessage

      private String getUpdateMessage()
      Prepares a update message to inform players about current game board state.
      Returns:
      String in format of update;playerColor;board

    • isConnected

      private boolean isConnected(Socket socket)
      Determines whether client socket is still connected with server. Pings client and awaits response.
      Parameters:
      socket - Client socket
      Returns:
      true if socket is connected and false otherwise

    • closeServerSocket

      public void closeServerSocket()
      Safely closes ServerSocket and informs clients beforehand.

    • requestStop

      public void requestStop()
      Sets stopRequest flag to true. Safely demands for thread stop.
